outputs.output_descr:
Building upon the findings of the Arab States Human Development Reports (AHDR) and taking into account and addressing the issue of citizen security in the Arab States Region, the overall objective of this programme is to support institution building within the context of good governance and the rule of law. 

Activities will concentrate on bringing together stakeholders such as civil society organisations with expertise in citizen security and human rights issues with representatives of the principal state institutions responsible for state and citizen security, in a concerted effort to generate the stuctural and policy reforms required to approach security and institution building needs within the context of good governance and rule of law.
outputs.output_title: Rule of Law Arab States Modern

project_descr: Strengthening the Rule of Law through Modernizing Prosecutors' Offices
project_title: Rule of Law Arab States Modernization Prosecutors Office
